scripts.install:web: cd web && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn && yarn add ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.install:mobile: cd mobile && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn && yarn add ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.install:all: yarn install:core && yarn install:web && yarn install:mobile
